title: I was programming in pig, i'll loaded the below dataset
body:
Apple iPhone 6s Plus 16GB Space Gray T-Mobile Smartphone 2 cases + Box:

Iphone 6s 16gb rose gold factory unlocked:$280

iPhone 6s 64gb T-Mobile:$350

Iphone 6S Plus 64 GB Space Gray Sprint International Unlocked:$385

this is my dataset Brand Name followed by price in $symbol

when i load this data using this command

->scrap = LOAD '/user/vickysmartboy15/hadoop-test1/scrap.txt' USING pigstorage(':') as (Name:chararray, Price:int);

some error occured,i need some help
